column2: an A.M. Eatery////I went a while back on a weekday morning. I arrived around 7am and by the time I left the line and parking lot were crazy. The staff were nice--they tag your order with your name
column3: which does feel more personal. My biggest issue was the food. I ordered the pancake sampler (you choose any three pancakes from their crazy list of options). I love pancakes and was super excited
column4: but all of the pancakes were WAY too sweet and all came covered in syrups/glazes that were just overwhelming. If you had blindfolded me and told me it was cake
column5: I still would have said it was too sugary. If that's your jam
column6: go forth and be happy. Otherwise
column7: steer clear of the pancakes and try to go early to avoid the crowds.
